testcase.purpose: Check if the Database.changeVersion method exists
Check if the Database.readTransaction method exists
Check if the Database.transaction method exists
Check if the Database.version attribute exists
Check if the SQLError.code attribute exists
Check if the SQLError.CONSTRAINT_ERR exists and its type is number and its value is 7
Check if the SQLError.CONSTRAINT_ERR exists and its type is number and its value is 1
Check if the Exception Code definition is in webruntime
Check if the SQLException.CONSTRAINT_ERR constant exists
Check if the SQLException.DATABASE_ERR constant exists
Check if the SQLException.QUOTA_ERR constant exists
Check if the SQLException.TOO_LARGE_ERR constant exists
Check if the SQLException.UNKNOWN_ERR constant exists
Check if the SQLException.VERSION_ERR constant exists
Check if the SQLResultSetRowList.item method exists
Check if the SQLResultSetRowList.length attribute exists
Check if the SQLResultSet.insertId attribute exists
Check if the SQLResultSet.rowsAffected attribute exists
Check if the SQLResultSet.rows attribute exists
Check if the SQLTransaction.executeSql method exists
Check if the window.openDatabase method exists
Check if DatabaseCallback handleEvent() method with database argument that handleEvent will be invoked
Check if DatabaseCallback handleEvent() method no set arguments that handleEvent will be invoked
Check if an exception should be thrown when readTransaction callback parameter is null on sync database
Check if Database.changeVersion has all valid arguments that expecting the database'version is to be changed
Check if the parameter 'newVersion' of the method Database.changeVersion is 2.0 that expecting the database's version is to be 2.0
Check if Database.changeVersion() can change database's version when the new Version less than old version
Check if the parameter 'newVersion' of the method Database.changeVersion is null that expecting the database's version is to be 'null'
Check if Database.changeVersion has no argument that expecting an exception is to be thrown
Check if Database.changeVersion can update database version and update schema without errro callback
Check if changeVersion() method with no successCallback that database version will be string 2.0
Check if Database.changeVersion can update database version and update schema at same time
Check if Database.changeVersion has a wrong oldVersion that expecting a VERSION_ERR exception is to be thrown
Check if Database.readTransaction() can run readRransaction to execute the read-only database operations
Check if readTransaction() method set null value of callback that expecting an exception is to be thrown
Check if readTransaction() method with no preflight operation or postflight operation that errorCallback will be called
Check if readTransaction() method set null value of errorCallback that callback will be invoked
Check if Database.readTransaction has no argument that expecting an exception is to be thrown
Check if readTransaction() method set null value of successCallback that callback will be invoked
Check if transaction() method has full valid arguments that expecting the sql is to be executed
Check if transaction() method set null value of callback that expecting a TYPE_MISMATCH_ERR exception is to be thrown
Check if transaction() method with no preflight operation or postflight operation that errorCallback will be called
Check if transaction() method set null value of errorCallback that callback will be invoked
Check if Database.transaction has no argument that expecting an exception is to be thrown
Check if transaction() method with right operation that successCallback will be invoked
Check if transaction() method set null value of successCallback that callback will be invoked
Check if the database version is 2.0
Check if the database's version is empty string
Check if the attribute Database.version has a normal value
Check if the database'sversion is string null
Check if the type of version is string and it is readonly
Check if changeVersion() method with error oldversion that SQLError.code will be 2
Check if executeSql() method missing argument that SQLError code will be 5
Check if the type of e.code is number and it's readonly
Check if executeSql() method missing argument that SQLError.message will be number of '?'s in statement string does not match argument count
Check if the e.message exists and its type is string and it's readonly
Check if the e.QUOTA_ERR exists and its type is number and its value is 4
Check if the e.SYNTAX_ERR exists and its type is number and its value is 5
CCheck if the e.TIMEOUT_ERR exists and its type is number and its value is 7
Check if the e.TOO_LARGE_ERR exists and its type is number and its value is 3
Check if the e.UNKNOWN_ERR exists and its type is number and its value is 0
Check if the e.VERSION_ERR exists and its type is number and its value is 2
Check if SQLResultSetRowList item index of 3 that content_string will be test4
Check if SQLResultSetRowList item index of 3 that id_number will be 4
Check if SQLResultSetRowList.item has no argument that expecting an exception is to be thrown
Check if the SQLResultSetRowList length is 0 with select table of no any rows
Check if the SQLResultSetRowList length is 1 with select table have one row
Check if the SQLResultSetRowList length is 10 with select table have 10 rows
Check if the type of rows.length is number and it's readonly
Check if the statement inserted 3 rows, the ID of the last row must be the one returned
Check if the type of r.insertId is number and it's readonly
Check if SQLResultSet.insertId() throw an INVALID_ACCESS_ERR exception when do update operation
Check if the rowsAffected attribute must return one rows that were changed by the insert statement
Check if the type of r.rowsAffected is number and it's readonly
Check if the statement did not affected any rows, then the rowsAffected must return zero
Check if the rowsAffected attribute should return two rows that were changed by the update statement
Check if SQLResultSet rows item(0) returns an type of object
Check if the type of r.rows is object and it's readonly
Check if the SQLStatementCallback handleEvent with no arguments that handleEvent will be invoked
Check if the SQLStatementCallback handleEvent() method with resultSet argument that resultSet.rows.length is 3
Check if the SQLStatementCallback handleEvent() method with SQLTransaction argument that SQLTransaction returns an type of object
Check if the SQLStatementCallback handleEvent() method with SQLTransaction and resultSet arguments that resultSet.insertId is 1
Check if SQLStatementErrorCallback handleEvent() method with no arguments that handleEvent will be invoked
Check if executeSql() method insert existing value into primary key column that SQLStatementErrorCallback will be invoked and SQLError.code will be CONSTRAINT_ERR
Check if executeSql() method with syntax error that SQLStatementErrorCallback will be invoked and SQLError.code will be SYNTAX_ERR
Check if SQLStatementErrorCallback handleEvent() method with transaction argument that handleEvent will be invoked
Check if SQLStatementErrorCallback handleEvent() method with transaction and SQLError arguments that handleEvent will be invoked
Check if the SQLTransactionCallback handleEvent with no arguments that handleEvent will be invoked
Check if the SQLTransactionCallback handleEvent with SQLTransaction argument that handleEvent will be invoked
Check if executeSql() method missing argument that SQLTransactionErrorCallback will be invoked and SQLError.code will be SYNTAX_ERR
Check if changeVersion() method with error oldversion that SQLTransactionErrorCallback will be invoked and SQLError.code will be VERSION_ERR
Check if SQLTransaction.executeSql has all valid arguments that expecting the select statement is to be executed successfully
Check if the executeSql() method statement create table that successCallback will be invoked
Check if sql step will be skipped if one substep with error
Check if the executeSql() method statement insert value into table that successCallback will be invoked
Check if SQLTransaction.executeSql has no argument that expecting an exception is to be thrown
Check if can invoke SQLTransaction.executeSql with only available statement and other parameters are null
Check if can invoke SQLTransaction.executeSql invoke executeSql with only null statement
Check if the executeSql() method statement update table that successCallback will be invoked
Check if window.openDatabase has all valid arguments that expecting a database object is to be returned
Check if openDatabase() method with callback that database will be created successfully
Check if the argument 'name' of the method window.openDatabase is empty string that expecting a database object is to be returned
Check if the argument 'name' of the method window.openDatabase is null that expecting a database object is to be returned
Check if window.openDatabase has no argument that expecting an exception is to be thrown
Check if openDatabase() method have no set creationCallback that database will be created successfully
Check if openDatabase() method have no set estimatedSize value that expecting an exception will be thrown
Check if openDatabase() method set version value 2.0 that database will be created successfully
Check if the argument 'version' of the method window.openDatabase is empty string that expecting a database object is to be returned
Check if the argument 'version' of the method window.openDatabase is null that expecting a database object is to be returned
Check if WorkerUtils.openDatabaseSync has no argument that expecting an exception is to be thrown

Check if WorkerUtils.openDatabase throws an exception INVALID_STATE_ERR when there is already a database with the given name from the origin, but the database has a different version than the version provided
Check if WorkerUtils.openDatabase has no argument that expecting an exception is to be thrown
Check if changeVersion() method with error oldVersion that errorCallback will be called
Check if Database.readTransaction() method throws an SYNTAX_ERR exception when run readRransaction to execute the write database operations
Check if Database.readTransaction() method throws an SYNTAX_ERR exception when run readRransaction to execute the update database operations
Check if SQLResultSet.insertId() throw an INVALID_ACCESS_ERR exception when do delete operation
Check if SQLResultSet.insertId() throw an INVALID_ACCESS_ERR exception when drop table
Check if the statement did not insert a row, then the attribute must instead raise an INVALID_ACCESS_ERR exception
Check if the value of SQLResultSet's attribute is correct when do insert opertaion
Check if invoke executeSql to execute select statement that expecting the value of results is correct
Check if invoke executeSql to execute select statement in readTransaction that expecting the value of results is correct
Check if invoke executeSql to execute create table statuement (non-record relevant statement) that expecting the value of results is correct
Check if invoke executeSql to execute UPDATE statement that expecting the value of results is correct
Check if SQLTransaction.executeSql should be thrown a INVALID_STATE_ERR exception when no executeSql in transaction
Check if SQLTransaction execute sql step will be skipped if one substep with error
Check if the SQLTransaction.executeSql() execute sql with question mark (?) as wildcard that expecting a SYNTAX_ERR exception is to be thrown
Check if the SQLTransaction.executeSql() execute sql with unsupported keyword that expecting a SYNTAX_ERR exception is to be thrown
Check if example of constructing the query using only '?' characters, and then pass the variables in as the second argument
Check if example of substituting variables into statements without risking SQL injection
Check if example of a script using webdatabase API
Check if the database having the empty string as its version when the window.openDatabase callback is invoked

Check if window.openDatabase throws an exception INVALID_STATE_ERR when there is already a database with the given name from the origin, but the database has a different version than the version provided
Check if database names must be compared in a case-sensitive manner when calls window.openDatabase
Check if the database is created with the given database version as its version when the window.openDatabase callback is not provided

Check if WorkerUtils.openDatabaseSync throws an exception INVALID_STATE_ERR when there is already a database with the given name from the origin, but the database has a different version than the version provided
